content.body: hi all! i'm working with fetch keepalive and noticed the spec doesn't provide the user with a clear reason why the request returned a NetworkError. the spec at https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#http-network-or-cache-fetch describes if the 64kib limit is exceeded, a "NetworkError" should be returned, but that prevents any kind of reasonable error handling regarding the business code. the sending party could simply try again later, when the fetchGroup is empty again or there's enough space left, but since they don't know the _reason_, it might as well be a non-recoverable error and retrying won't bring any better results. does that make sense? is this the right place to discuss this? ðŸ˜…
content.formatted_body: hi all! i'm working with fetch keepalive and noticed the spec doesn't provide the user with a clear reason why the request returned a NetworkError. the spec at https://fetch.spec.whatwg.org/#http-network-or-cache-fetch describes if the 64kib limit is exceeded, a "NetworkError" should be returned, but that prevents any kind of reasonable error handling regarding the business code. the sending party could simply try again later, when the fetchGroup is empty again or there's enough space left, but since they don't know the reason, it might as well be a non-recoverable error and retrying won't bring any better results. does that make sense? is this the right place to discuss this? ðŸ˜…

content.body:
Just FYI, I plan on landing a few customizable select HTML PRs towards the end of this week. They've been sitting for a while with addressed comments, 2 implementer support, stage 3, and they LGTM. I'm referring to:

- Content model: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10586
- selectedcontent: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10633
- UA stylesheet: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10670
- Probably the base appearance one too, assuming it also LGTM when I finish reviewing it: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10629
content.formatted_body:
Just FYI, I plan on landing a few customizable select HTML PRs towards the end of this week. They've been sitting for a while with addressed comments, 2 implementer support, stage 3, and they LGTM. I'm referring to:

  • Content model: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10586
  • selectedcontent: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10633
  • UA stylesheet: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10670
  • Probably the base appearance one too, assuming it also LGTM when I finish reviewing it: https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/10629

content.body: Dominic Farolino: I'd like to review them before we land and I'm not sure I can get to it this week.
content.formatted_body: Dominic Farolino: I'd like to review them before we land and I'm not sure I can get to it this week.

content.body: Gotcha. I'll hold off on merging, let me know if you think you can review any this week or next.
